DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate predictor response antipsychotic medication subject schizophrenia . The investigator evaluate psychopathology , brain MRI , genetics neuropsychological profile . Two group treatment compare : first generation antipsychotic vs. second generation antipsychotic . Participants randomize one group . Trial duration : 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: Identifying Predictors Response Antipsychotics Using Treatment Algorithm
DOC.criteria: Schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder Age : 1845 year olde Less 10 year diagnosis Acute exacerbation psychotic symptom Use clozapine Clinical unstable disease Delirium cognitive disorder
